content: Write a suspenseful story about a disgruntled secretary named Marion Crane who works at a real estate firm in Phoenix, Arizona. One day, her boss entrusts her with $40,000 to deposit at the bank and she decides to steal it and start a new life with her boyfriend. On the way, she gets pulled over by a police officer but manages to get away. She eventually stops at a desolate motel called the Bates Motel, run by a man named Norman Bates who lives with his domineering and mentally ill mother. There, she decides to return the money, but meets a tragic end in her bathroom. Have the story follow Marion's sister, Lila, who teams up with Marion's boyfriend and a private investigator to uncover the truth about Marion's disappearance and the terrifying reality of Norman Bates.
